meanings.definition: A type of elementary particle that does not experience the strong nuclear force.
meanings.sent1: Leptons are tiny particles that do not feel the strong nuclear force.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study leptons to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The lepton family always avoids the strong nuclear force parties.
meanings.sent4: In the world of particles, leptons are like the loners who don't join the strong force group.
meanings.sent5: Imagine leptons as the shy particles that stay away from the strong nuclear force crowd.

meanings.definition: A subatomic particle with a half-integer spin.
meanings.sent1: The lepton's spin is only half-integer, unlike other particles.
meanings.sent2: Physicists have observed the unique spin of leptons in experiments.
meanings.sent3: The lepton's half-integer spin makes it a cool subatomic character.
meanings.sent4: In the quantum world, leptons spin like no other particles.
meanings.sent5: Picture leptons as the spinning dancers with their half-integer moves in the subatomic dance floor.
